cta.title: Hi, I'm Vahe — Full Stack Developer
cta.description: I create reliable and scalable web solutions focusing on performance, stability, and user-friendliness. I help companies turn ideas into stable and effective products.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional path, key roles, and achievements in companies I collaborated with.

activity.title: Extracurricular Activity
activity.description: My projects and initiatives outside of work.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: My name is Vahe, Full-stack developer specializing in Nuxt.js and Laravel. I create fast and convenient web apps, worked with microservices, APIs (REST & GraphQL), system integrations, and complex UI. I value reliability, clean code, and projects that bring real value.

projects.title: What I Build and Develop
projects.description: Author projects and commercial cases implemented from scratch — from idea to scaling. I implement IT, design, and other creative/business solutions.
projects.what_i_offer: I’ll be happy to help bring your idea to life — from initial concept to a fully ready solution. We can discuss all project details, choose the best technologies and approaches for maximum efficiency. My goal is to make the process transparent and convenient so your idea becomes exactly what you imagined.

shop.title: Author Solutions and Projects
shop.description: I sell and share my own developments — from stylish landing pages to large microservice systems and ready-to-use solutions. Everything needed for a fast start and product growth.
